welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Colwood, a charming city known for its beautiful nature, friendly community, and rich history. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Victoria Inner Harbor Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Floatplane Terminal
terminals.description: The floatplane terminal at Victoria Inner Harbor Airport serves flights to and from nearby islands and coastal destinations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fairchild International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fairchild International Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Friday Harbor Airport provides services for commercial and general aviation flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Springbank Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Springbank Airport is used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Duncan/Quam Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Duncan/Quam Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
